summary:
Pairing: Sebastian Stan x Reader
Chris Evans x Reader.
Warning: none. 
P.S ; I have a idea in my mind for this series it is just...
body:
Surrender To Me. (Prologue)

Pairing: Sebastian Stan x Reader

Chris Evans x Reader.

Warning: none.

P.S ; I have a idea in my mind for this series it is just i am having a hard time deciding how to do it and make this the best it can be,this is going to be a different series because i want you guys to make the choices so in some chapters i am going to give you options like Yes or No. I am going to write for them both ansd all the choices will lead up to a different ending. Your feedback is really important. If you have any ideas,hmu.

I think that the first chapter will be published tomorrow or this Sunday but I promise to anyone who is following,i won’t keep you waiting. Thank you to everyone again and again. Lots of love! - V

You had your little group,four of you were like a little family,the happy and safe family that you never had.

Scarlett,she was your best friend but you saw her nothing less than a sister.

Her long black hair up in curls,her red nails and god like body,she was a gift to humanity,she had a heart of gold and you knew she would always protect and love you.

You grew up with her,in her family,in her house. They loved you like their own.

You met Sebastian and Chris while working as a makeup artist,three of you bonded quickly,in the meantime you fell head over heels with Sebastian,he was all you could think of,he was the love of your life,you thought. He was everything you dreamed of.

You introduced Chris to Scarlett in a party she threw with her then boyfriend,it was obvious that they were having problems but you confirmed it when yoh saw them dancing across the room.

It made you feel happy,back then.

And that’s how your little group became a family.

They started dating everything was like unicorns and cotton candy.

You went on dates,you got together in each other’s houses for dinner,getting awfully drunk and roaming the streets.

In that time,you had the chance to know Chris,you saw him a friend,the best one.

When he was talking you felt safe,his words taking away your insecurities your worries,he made you feel like a floating feather.

His soft sweaters gave you a feeling of home and you didn’t know that feeling.

You started to cave in,craving his touch,longing for his voice wanting to be around him all the time.

You desperately wanted to go home..

TAGLIST!!

@boredoutofmymindwriting

| 20s I In love with Chris Evans 💕|

| I can do this all day. | Masterlist |

summary: Here come Prince Evans and his one and only Snow White!
body:
Here come Prince Evans and his one and only Snow White!

Imagine:

RDJ was throwing a costume party, again. Of course, you and your boyfriend, Chris are invited. What do you think you two should wear?

P.S~

Something that pop up in my mind after watching the rumor of Chris being the Prince in Snow White. I have no hate towards Lily Collins, to be clear! Also, I have already had a sequel of this in mind!!!! English is not my first language, so please do forgive me if I make any mistakes, which I am so sure that there are some in my writing;)) Enjoy~

My Masterlist

He is like a prince when he dresses like this in this GIF;)

— At your shared house —

You were scrolling those social media and saw some news about your boyfriend.

“Chris, the fans are saying that you should be the prince in Snow White. They are saying you’re indeed a prince. Oh, you must look so great in those Prince costume. Do you think Disney will really consider it?” You couldn’t help but started your whole fangirl rambling about the news.

“How about the Snow White? Who do they choose for Snow White? You?” Chris sat next to you on the couch after he got two cups of coffee for you two.

“Nah. I’m not eligible for it.”

“Nonsense! No one would be eligible then!” He jokingly said as his tone sounded like he was defending you. However, the jealousy and more importantly, the self-doubt made you kinda blind.

“How about Collin?” You handed him your phone so to show him the post that you’re reading and he took your phone, “I think you two will really make a good couple.” You smiled at him bitterly when you said so.

Chris only took a brief glance at your phone before he put your phone on the coffee table and took your hands in his instead.

“Y/n, stop thinking about it! You would only be my Snow White, my one and only Snow White. If things have worked out between me and Collin, I will not be here. And now, obviously, I’m with you and there’s no way I would let you go! Remember what I’ve said before, y/n, I’ll only let go if you do. (P.S. this plot goes to my another work!) If you’re not being Snow White with me, then Disney is not having me as the prince! Not to mention that I don’t think they are really thinking about finding me cause I’m too old to be a prince.” He first stared at you lovingly and then giggled at his “old” joke, trying to lighten up your mood.

You heard what Chris said and it comforted you as always. You threw your arms around his neck and laid your head on his shoulder.

“I’m sorry that I always think that I don’t deserve you. I just can’t help. Thank you for always being with me whenever I doubt myself.” You said then you pecked his cheeks.

“You’re such a fool! A fool that doubts yourself and thanks your boyfriend for being there for you!” He returned your peck with a kiss on your lips.

You two stayed on the couch and snuggled for the following hours, doing nothing but only drinking coffee and watching Disney movies. Before “Moana” ended, you fell asleep sitting on Chris’s lap and your head lying

At nearly 3, Chris’s phone rang. He looked at the screen, realized it’s from Downey. Then, he stared at you and realized you were stirring a bit because of the noise from the phone. He sneaked out from the couch and picked up the phone at the kitchen.

“Hey, Downey!“

“Hi, Evans! What takes you so long? I am thinking you’re not gonna answer my call.”

“Oh, I would be out of my mind if I don’t pick up the greatest RDJ’s call. Y/n is sleeping, I don’t wanna wake her up.”

“Oh! Being a caring boyfriend here, I see. Anyway, I’m throwing a costume party tonight! You and Y/n have 5 hours to get ready! The theme is Disney, which is your favorite. Do you get me?”

“Why so sudden, Downey? I’m not complaining, of course, just wondering.” Chris slightly chuckled of RDJ’s idea of throwing a costume party themed on Disney.

“Well, no reasons at all. I’m just being a random person as always! See you two tonight, my dear! I’ve tried to invite as many of the Avengers as I can. Okay, I’m gonna call others now! You know my address in LA. Bye, Evans!” RDJ blew Chris a kiss through the screen before he hung up the phone.

Chris walked back to the couch where you were sleeping on, he saw your sleeping face and gave a peck on your forehead. He had already got something in mind and he wrote a note and put it on the coffee table before he took the car key and left the house.

“Hey, sleepyhead!” You were wakened by Chris once he got back and shook your body slightly.

“Mmm…Chris? Oh god, how long did I sleep?” You rubbed your eyes while you asked him.

“Long enough for me to go out and buy what we need for tonight’s party.”

“Party? What party?”

“Well, RDJ is currently in LA for filming and he is throwing a costume party with the theme of Disney tonight. Of course, we are invited!”

“What? Costume party? Then what should I wear? Oh god, you should wake me up! Now I have nothing to wear for the party!”

“Don’t worry. I’ve already prepared it for you!” Chris said and then handed you a costume before he urged you to change it upstairs.

After you changed the costume and put on some make up, you went downstairs and saw that Chris was in his costume too.

“Why Snow White?” You stretched your hands and turned around in front of Chris.

“You don’t wike it?” Chris in his Prince Ferdinand costume asked.

“I love it, just wonder why it’s Snow White but not your favorite Little Mermaid.“

“It doesn’t matter what princess you’re, it only matters whose princess you’re. The answer is you’re forever my princess. Only I can tell that you’re eligible or not, and you’re the only one who’s always eligible.” Chris told you as he stared at you so deeply and showed you how much he loves you.

You could feel his love of course and his words just made some tears brimming in your eyes. All you could do is to throw your arms around his neck and left a lipstick mark on his face.

— At RDJ’s party –

“Here come Prince Evans and his one and only Snow White!” RDJ said so as he opened the door for you and Chris to get inside. He gave you two a big hug.

“Hi, Downey! I miss you so much! Thank for inviting us here!”

“Oh, dear. You have no idea how much I miss you since the wrapping up of the Avengers! I know you would never say no for a party with the theme of Disney!”

“Oh, Robert. I would never say no to all of your parties!” You said to RDJ with a wide smile broke on your face.

“Well, go and have some drinks before the DJ plays you some songs to do slow dancing.” RDJ led you and Chris to the bar area of his house before he went to find Susan.

Chris ordered your favorite cocktail from the bar and you two started to chat before the DJ played the emotional songs.

“I feel like I’m not old enough to drink in this Snow White costume, considering Snow White is only 14.“

Chris laughed as he grabbed his left boob.

“You’re hilarious, babe. That’s why I love you so much!” He leaned down and kissed you. You could taste the smell of Vodka when you two were kissing.

Once you two finished your drinks, the DJ finally played some slow songs and Chris stretched out his hand.

“May I, overgrown Snow White?”

“Yes, dear prince. You’re lucky that I’m nice enough to say yes even you’ve called me overgrown.” You put your hand in his as you said yes.

Then, Chris and you danced along with the songs, nothing had stopped your feet, no matter the songs were fast or slow.

Later that night, RDJ sent you back some photos that he took while you and Chris were dancing. You’re in Chris’s arms and you two smiled so widely to each other.

Chris posted the photo of you two on his only social media, Twitter, with the caption, “Prince Evans and his one and only Snow White, ￼@y￼/n. Waiting for her to finally become an adult so that the prince can marry her. Even without the certificate now, these two can already picture their future of living happily ever after.”

You saw his post while you were sitting between his legs, you tilted up your head and smiled at him before you retweeted his post, saying “Dear prince, age is really just a number. Moreover, there’s no need for waiting cause you’ve just called me overgrown and indeed I am.”

“Hi, Evans! What takes you so long? I am thinking you’re not gonna answer my call.”

“Oh, I would be out of my mind if I don’t pick up the greatest RDJ’s call. Y/n is sleeping, I don’t wanna wake her up.”

“Oh! Being a caring boyfriend here, I see. Anyway, I’m throwing a costume party tonight! You and Y/n have 5 hours to get ready! The theme is Disney, which is your favorite. Do you get me?”

“Why so sudden, Downey? I’m not complaining, of course, just wondering.” Chris slightly chuckled of RDJ’s idea of throwing a costume party themed on Disney.

“Well, no reasons at all. I’m just being a random person as always! See you two tonight, my dear! I’ve tried to invite as many of the Avengers as I can. Okay, I’m gonna call others now! You know my address in LA. Bye, Evans!” RDJ blew Chris a kiss through the screen before he hung up the phone.

Chris walked back to the couch where you were sleeping on, he saw your sleeping face and gave a peck on your forehead. He had already got something in mind and he wrote a note and put it on the coffee table before he took the car key and left the house.

“Hey, sleepyhead!” You were wakened by Chris once he got back and shook your body slightly.

“Mmm…Chris? Oh god, how long did I sleep?” You rubbed your eyes while you asked him.

“Long enough for me to go out and buy what we need for tonight’s party.”

“Party? What party?”

“Well, RDJ is currently in LA for filming and he is throwing a costume party with the theme of Disney tonight. Of course, we are invited!”

“What? Costume party? Then what should I wear? Oh god, you should wake me up! Now I have nothing to wear for the party!”

“Don’t worry. I’ve already prepared it for you!” Chris said and then handed you a costume before he urged you to change it upstairs.

After you changed the costume and put on some make up, you went downstairs and saw that Chris was in his costume too.

“Why Snow White?” You stretched your hands and turned around in front of Chris.

“You don’t wike it?” Chris in his Prince Ferdinand costume asked.

“I love it, just wonder why it’s Snow White but not your favorite Little Mermaid.“

“It doesn’t matter what princess you’re, it only matters whose princess you’re. The answer is you’re forever my princess. Only I can tell that you’re eligible or not, and you’re the only one who’s always eligible.” Chris told you as he stared at you so deeply and showed you how much he loves you.

You could feel his love of course and his words just made some tears brimming in your eyes. All you could do is to throw your arms around his neck and left a lipstick mark on his face.

— At RDJ’s party –

“Here come Prince Evans and his one and only Snow White!” RDJ said so as he opened the door for you and Chris to get inside. He gave you two a big hug.

“Hi, Downey! I miss you so much! Thank for inviting us here!”

“Oh, dear. You have no idea how much I miss you since the wrapping up of the Avengers! I know you would never say no for a party with the theme of Disney!”

“Oh, Robert. I would never say no to all of your parties!” You said to RDJ with a wide smile broke on your face.

“Well, go and have some drinks before the DJ plays you some songs to do slow dancing.” RDJ led you and Chris to the bar area of his house before he went to find Susan.

Chris ordered your favorite cocktail from the bar and you two started to chat before the DJ played the emotional songs.

“I feel like I’m not old enough to drink in this Snow White costume, considering Snow White is only 14.“

Chris laughed as he grabbed his left boob.

“You’re hilarious, babe. That’s why I love you so much!” He leaned down and kissed you. You could taste the smell of Vodka when you two were kissing.

Once you two finished your drinks, the DJ finally played some slow songs and Chris stretched out his hand.

“May I, overgrown Snow White?”

“Yes, dear prince. You’re lucky that I’m nice enough to say yes even you’ve called me overgrown.” You put your hand in his as you said yes.

Then, Chris and you danced along with the songs, nothing had stopped your feet, no matter the songs were fast or slow.

Later that night, RDJ sent you back some photos that he took while you and Chris were dancing. You’re in Chris’s arms and you two smiled so widely to each other.

Chris posted the photo of you two on his only social media, Twitter, with the caption, “Prince Evans and his one and only Snow White, ￼@y￼/n. Waiting for her to finally become an adult so that the prince can marry her. Even without the certificate now, these two can already picture their future of living happily ever after.”

You saw his post while you were sitting between his legs, you tilted up your head and smiled at him before you retweeted his post, saying “Dear prince, age is really just a number. Moreover, there’s no need for waiting cause you’ve just called me overgrown and indeed I am.”
trail.content:
Here come Prince Evans and his one and only Snow White!

Imagine:

RDJ was throwing a costume party, again. Of course, you and your boyfriend, Chris are invited. What do you think you two should wear?

P.S~

Something that pop up in my mind after watching the rumor of Chris being the Prince in Snow White. I have no hate towards Lily Collins, to be clear! Also, I have already had a sequel of this in mind!!!! English is not my first language, so please do forgive me if I make any mistakes, which I am so sure that there are some in my writing;)) Enjoy~

My Masterlist

He is like a prince when he dresses like this in this GIF;)

— At your shared house —

You were scrolling those social media and saw some news about your boyfriend.

“Chris, the fans are saying that you should be the prince in Snow White. They are saying you’re indeed a prince. Oh, you must look so great in those Prince costume. Do you think Disney will really consider it?” You couldn’t help but started your whole fangirl rambling about the news.

“How about the Snow White? Who do they choose for Snow White? You?” Chris sat next to you on the couch after he got two cups of coffee for you two.

“Nah. I’m not eligible for it.”

“Nonsense! No one would be eligible then!” He jokingly said as his tone sounded like he was defending you. However, the jealousy and more importantly, the self-doubt made you kinda blind.

“How about Collin?” You handed him your phone so to show him the post that you’re reading and he took your phone, “I think you two will really make a good couple.” You smiled at him bitterly when you said so.

Chris only took a brief glance at your phone before he put your phone on the coffee table and took your hands in his instead.

“Y/n, stop thinking about it! You would only be my Snow White, my one and only Snow White. If things have worked out between me and Collin, I will not be here. And now, obviously, I’m with you and there’s no way I would let you go! Remember what I’ve said before, y/n, I’ll only let go if you do. (P.S. this plot goes to my another work!) If you’re not being Snow White with me, then Disney is not having me as the prince! Not to mention that I don’t think they are really thinking about finding me cause I’m too old to be a prince.” He first stared at you lovingly and then giggled at his “old” joke, trying to lighten up your mood.

You heard what Chris said and it comforted you as always. You threw your arms around his neck and laid your head on his shoulder.

“I’m sorry that I always think that I don’t deserve you. I just can’t help. Thank you for always being with me whenever I doubt myself.” You said then you pecked his cheeks.

“You’re such a fool! A fool that doubts yourself and thanks your boyfriend for being there for you!” He returned your peck with a kiss on your lips.

You two stayed on the couch and snuggled for the following hours, doing nothing but only drinking coffee and watching Disney movies. Before “Moana” ended, you fell asleep sitting on Chris’s lap and your head lying

At nearly 3, Chris’s phone rang. He looked at the screen, realized it’s from Downey. Then, he stared at you and realized you were stirring a bit because of the noise from the phone. He sneaked out from the couch and picked up the phone at the kitchen.

“Hey, Downey!“

“Hi, Evans! What takes you so long? I am thinking you’re not gonna answer my call.”

“Oh, I would be out of my mind if I don’t pick up the greatest RDJ’s call. Y/n is sleeping, I don’t wanna wake her up.”

“Oh! Being a caring boyfriend here, I see. Anyway, I’m throwing a costume party tonight! You and Y/n have 5 hours to get ready! The theme is Disney, which is your favorite. Do you get me?”

“Why so sudden, Downey? I’m not complaining, of course, just wondering.” Chris slightly chuckled of RDJ’s idea of throwing a costume party themed on Disney.

“Well, no reasons at all. I’m just being a random person as always! See you two tonight, my dear! I’ve tried to invite as many of the Avengers as I can. Okay, I’m gonna call others now! You know my address in LA. Bye, Evans!” RDJ blew Chris a kiss through the screen before he hung up the phone.

Chris walked back to the couch where you were sleeping on, he saw your sleeping face and gave a peck on your forehead. He had already got something in mind and he wrote a note and put it on the coffee table before he took the car key and left the house.

“Hey, sleepyhead!” You were wakened by Chris once he got back and shook your body slightly.

“Mmm…Chris? Oh god, how long did I sleep?” You rubbed your eyes while you asked him.

“Long enough for me to go out and buy what we need for tonight’s party.”

“Party? What party?”

“Well, RDJ is currently in LA for filming and he is throwing a costume party with the theme of Disney tonight. Of course, we are invited!”

“What? Costume party? Then what should I wear? Oh god, you should wake me up! Now I have nothing to wear for the party!”

“Don’t worry. I’ve already prepared it for you!” Chris said and then handed you a costume before he urged you to change it upstairs.

After you changed the costume and put on some make up, you went downstairs and saw that Chris was in his costume too.

“Why Snow White?” You stretched your hands and turned around in front of Chris.

“You don’t wike it?” Chris in his Prince Ferdinand costume asked.

“I love it, just wonder why it’s Snow White but not your favorite Little Mermaid.“

“It doesn’t matter what princess you’re, it only matters whose princess you’re. The answer is you’re forever my princess. Only I can tell that you’re eligible or not, and you’re the only one who’s always eligible.” Chris told you as he stared at you so deeply and showed you how much he loves you.

You could feel his love of course and his words just made some tears brimming in your eyes. All you could do is to throw your arms around his neck and left a lipstick mark on his face.

— At RDJ’s party –

“Here come Prince Evans and his one and only Snow White!” RDJ said so as he opened the door for you and Chris to get inside. He gave you two a big hug.

“Hi, Downey! I miss you so much! Thank for inviting us here!”

“Oh, dear. You have no idea how much I miss you since the wrapping up of the Avengers! I know you would never say no for a party with the theme of Disney!”

“Oh, Robert. I would never say no to all of your parties!” You said to RDJ with a wide smile broke on your face.

“Well, go and have some drinks before the DJ plays you some songs to do slow dancing.” RDJ led you and Chris to the bar area of his house before he went to find Susan.

Chris ordered your favorite cocktail from the bar and you two started to chat before the DJ played the emotional songs.

“I feel like I’m not old enough to drink in this Snow White costume, considering Snow White is only 14.“

Chris laughed as he grabbed his left boob.

“You’re hilarious, babe. That’s why I love you so much!” He leaned down and kissed you. You could taste the smell of Vodka when you two were kissing.

Once you two finished your drinks, the DJ finally played some slow songs and Chris stretched out his hand.

“May I, overgrown Snow White?”

“Yes, dear prince. You’re lucky that I’m nice enough to say yes even you’ve called me overgrown.” You put your hand in his as you said yes.

Then, Chris and you danced along with the songs, nothing had stopped your feet, no matter the songs were fast or slow.

Waiting for her to finally become an adult so that the prince can marry her. Even without the certificate now, these two can already picture their future of living happily ever after.”

tags: i've been telling y'all to stop stanning
title: Chris Evans Needs to Stop
excerpt: In this house (the Splinter house), we have a (mostly) unified ranking of the Chrises. From best to worst it’s: Pine, Hemsworth, Evans, Pratt. Some people would swap Pine and Hemsworth, some would swap Hemsworth and Evans, but that particular inclination is increasingly proving itself to be a terrible mistake, because Chris Evans has a fatal flaw. He is Extremely Online.

He also doesn’t really strike me as the sex dungeon type, but I could be wrong 😂 anyway if it’s true good for him but my money’s on nah lol
